person_say: I've been lacking motivation to study lately, and I have no interest in it. Are there any ways to boost my study drive?
animal_say: There's a busy little bee named Bizy who specializes in procrastination and boosting motivation! Want to meet her? She can help you make studying fun and exciting!

person_say: Yes, I would love to meet Bizy! Making studying fun and exciting sounds amazing!
animal_say: Great choice! Let me introduce you to Bizy, our fabulous procrastination specialist! She'll be buzzing with ideas to make your study time a blast!
